body: E'a [es] reports that the Paraguayan government has enacted a Law on Languages. Indigenous Peoples Issues and Resources explains that,"The law requires public institutions to use the Guarani language as determined by the Constitution."
original_body: E'a [es] reports that the Paraguayan government has enacted a Law on Languages. Indigenous Peoples Issues and Resources explains that,"The law requires public institutions to use the Guarani language as determined by the Constitution."
title: Paraguay: Government Enacts Law on Languages

sentence: E'a [es] reports that the Paraguayan government has enacted a Law on Languages.
Indigenous Peoples Issues and Resources explains that,"The law requires public institutions to use the Guarani language as determined by the Constitution."
